### ğŸ’» ANOVA + Tukey (ExpDes.pt)

library(readr); library(dplyr); library(ggplot2)
library(ExpDes.pt)

  labs(title = "Altura â€“ EspÃ©cie Ã— AdubaÃ§Ã£o (split-plot, DIC)",
